description.english: Complete main task in Old Village.
description.german: Schließe die Hauptquest in Old Village ab.
description.french: Terminez la quête principale dans Old Village.
description.italian: Completa la missione principale in Old Village.
description.spanish: Completa la misión principal en Old Village.
description.russian: Выполните основной квест в Старой деревне.
description.portuguese: Complete a missão principal em Old Village.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie główne zadania w Starej Wsi

description.english: Complete all main quests on the Aqueduct
description.german: Schließe alle Hauptquests auf dem Aquädukt ab.
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes principales sur l'aqueduc.
description.italian: Completa tutte le missioni principali sull'Acquedotto.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones principales en el Acueducto.
description.schinese: 完成渡槽上的所有主要任务。
description.tchinese: 完成渡槽上的所有主要任務。
description.russian: Выполните все основные квесты на Акведуке.
description.portuguese: Complete todas as missões principais no Aqueduto.
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie główne zadania na Akwedukcie.
description.turkish: Su Kemeri üzerindeki tüm ana görevleri tamamlayın.

displayName.english: I came, I saw, I renewed.
displayName.german: Ich kam, ich sah, ich erneuerte mich.
displayName.french: Je suis venu, j'ai vu, j'ai renouvelé.
displayName.italian: Sono venuto, ho visto, ho rinnovato.
displayName.schinese: 我来了，我看到了，我更新了
displayName.tchinese: 我來了，我看到了，我更新了。
displayName.portuguese: Eu vim, eu vi, eu renovei.

description.english: Complete all tasks in the prologue.
description.german: Schließe alle Aufgaben im Prolog ab.
description.french: Terminez toutes les tâches du prologue.
description.italian: Completa tutte le attività nel prologo.
description.spanish: Completa todas las tareas del prólogo.
description.schinese: 完成序章中的所有任务。
description.tchinese: 完成序章中的所有任務。
description.portuguese: Complete todas as tarefas do prólogo.

description.english: Find all spear pieces, restore and reassemble.
description.german: Alle Speerstücke finden, restaurieren und wieder zusammensetzen.
description.french: Trouvez tous les morceaux de lance, restaurez et réassemblez.
description.italian: Trova tutti i pezzi di lancia, restaura e rimonta.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las piezas de lanza, restáuralas y vuelve a armarlas.
description.schinese: 找到所有长矛碎片，恢复并重新组装。
description.tchinese: 找到所有長矛碎片，恢復並重新組裝。
description.russian: Найдите все части копья, восстановите и соберите заново.
description.portuguese: Encontre todas as peças de lança, restaure e remonte.
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie kawałki włóczni, odnów i złóż.
description.turkish: Tüm mızrak parçalarını bulun, geri yükleyin ve yeniden birleştirin.

displayName.french: Créateur de la puissance de Rome.

displayName.english: Support to the power of Rome.

description.english: Order the parts and build a wooden cantilever.
description.german: Bestellen Sie Teile und bauen Sie eine Holzstütze.
description.french: Commandez des pièces et construisez un support en bois.
description.italian: Ordina le parti e costruisci un supporto in legno.
description.spanish: Solicite piezas y construya un soporte de madera.
description.schinese: 订购零件并建造木制支架。
description.tchinese: 訂購零件並建造木製支架。
description.russian: Заказывайте детали и соорудите деревянную опору.
description.portuguese: Encomende peças e construa um suporte de madeira.
description.polish: Zamów części i zbuduj drewnianą podporę.
description.turkish: Parçaları sipariş edin ve ahşap bir destek oluşturun.
